title: LFM/LFT Support main LF a jungle/mid flex for a casual team & LF a team
body:
LF a jungle/Mid flex or one of both for a 2-4 game a week casual team. Most of us are IRL friends. Play thurs fri sat normally after about 630pm nz time.
Also I'm asupport main/jungle backup.  Normally gold 4~
Can play most/all supports. Usually just match to team comp/adc. Hit me up in game or here for more details.
